document_data.name: Ekur
document_data.mainbody: '''Ekur''' was the ruler of [[Shussel]] in [[Unther]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Ekur was bargaining with the clergy of [[Isis]] for them to give their support to god-king [[Gilgeam]]. He was the second in command of the [[church of Gilgeam]], after [[Zimrilim]].
document_data.Personality: Ekur was vicious and not very able as a ruler. ''Circa'' [[1357 DR]], he sensed a catastrophe was coming and wanted protection in case Gilgeam fell.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, when [[Tiamat]] attacked [[Unthalass]], Ekor led his troops to support his god in the defence of that city, but arrived too late to save Gilgeam.

In the {{YearlinkName|1373}} Ekur, posing as the merchant Ahegi of the [[Wing's Reach]] in [[Messemprar]], joined the group of remaining followers of Gilgeam led by Zimrilin in a plot to resurect their god thanks to the help of a thief named [[Kehrsyn]] but in the end Ekur died in the fighting against Kehrsyn and his [[harper]] ally [[Demok]].
